SEARCH
Package main.java.nn.layers

Class LayerFunctions

java.lang.Object
main.java.nn.layers.LayerFunctions
public class LayerFunctions extends Object
Provides utility functions for common neural network layer operations such as convolution, pooling, and flattening. These functions are typically used within custom neural network layers.

  • Method Details

    • convolve2D

      public static Matrix convolve2D(Tensor tensor, Tensor kernel, int stride, int padding)
      Applies a 2D convolution operation to a given tensor using a specified kernel.
      Parameters:
      tensor - The input tensor to be convolved.
      kernel - The convolution kernel (filter).
      stride - The stride of the convolution.
      padding - The padding size applied to the tensor.
      Returns:
      A new Matrix representing the result of the convolution.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the input tensor is null.
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the input tensor's dimensions do not match the kernel's requirements.

    • padding2D

      public static Tensor padding2D(Tensor tensor, int padding)
      Applies padding to a 2D tensor.
      Parameters:
      tensor - The tensor to pad.
      padding - The amount of padding to apply to each side.
      Returns:
      A new Tensor with padding applied.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the tensor is null or the padding is negative.

    • padding2D

      public static Matrix padding2D(Matrix matrix, int padding)
      Applies padding to a Matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to pad.
      padding - The amount of padding to apply to each side.
      Returns:
      A new Matrix with padding applied.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the matrix is null or the padding is negative.

    • flatten

      public static Matrix flatten(Tensor tensor)
      Flattens a tensor into a single-column matrix.
      Parameters:
      tensor - The tensor to flatten.
      Returns:
      A Matrix where each element of the tensor is laid out in a single column.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the tensor is null.

    • maxPool2D

      public static Tensor maxPool2D(Tensor tensor, int size)
      Applies a max pooling operation to a tensor.
      Parameters:
      tensor - The tensor to apply max pooling to.
      size - The size of the window to use for max pooling.
      Returns:
      A new Tensor representing the max pooled output.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the tensor is null.
      RuntimeException - if the tensor's dimensions are not divisible by the pooling size.

    • maxTensor

      public static Value[] maxTensor(Tensor tensor)
      Extracts the maximum value from each channel of a tensor.
      Parameters:
      tensor - The tensor from which to extract maximum values.
      Returns:
      An array of Values, each representing the maximum value from a tensor channel.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the tensor is null.

    • maxMatrix

      public static Value maxMatrix(Matrix matrix)
      Finds the maximum value in a matrix.
      Parameters:
      matrix - The matrix to find the maximum value in.
      Returns:
      The maximum value found in the matrix.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the matrix is null.

    • bce_loss

      public static Value bce_loss(Matrix matrix1, Matrix matrix2)
      Computes the binary cross-entropy loss between two matrices.
      Parameters:
      matrix1 - The first matrix (usually predictions).
      matrix2 - The second matrix (usually targets).
      Returns:
      A Value representing the computed binary cross-entropy loss.
